title: Bill_Mollison-Permaculture_Two-Practical_Design_for_Town_and_Cou
description:
Book: Permaculture Two
Authors: B. C. Mollison, Bill Mollison
Language: English

ISBN13: 9780908228003
ISBN10: 0908228007

Published: Stanley, Tas. : Tagari, 1979.

Genres: Agricultural Ecology, Perennials, Organic Gardening, Permaculture Handbooks Manuals

Bill Mollison-Permaculture Two-Practical Design for Town and Country in Permanent Agriculture.pdf      (Size: 18.95 MB)

 		
"Permaculture Two" delves deeper into the concept of "consciously designed agricultural systems." Author, Bill Mollison, describes new approaches and solutions that have evolved around the world. Ways in which plants can modify climate and many forms of pollution are discussed. Highly productive, low-energy systems, are made clear, in this fascinating book that offers some concrete solutions for saving Mother Earth.
